title: Scrambled egg and toast with smoked salmon
description: This breakfast is the perfect brain food for when you have a challenging day ahead, plus it's super easy to make. Each serving provides 605kcal, 33g protein, 17g carbohydrate (of which 2g sugars), 44g fat (of which 21g saturates), 2g fibre and 3g salt.
ingredients: 1 tbsp butter, plus extra for spreading
salt and freshly ground black pepper
